Post_Title: I have no words to describe what this makes me feel. Source in comments.

Threads.Reply_Text:
Good luck telling the 800k members of this community to stop watching the death cup.

They could kill someone for supporting women and they still wouldn't care, because FuTbALl

Replies.Reply_Text: Not watching isn't going to make any difference here whatsoever. Get a grip.
Something id expect from someone who puts men playing with balls over people being murdered, raped, and inslaved.
Cute story internet activist.

Oooh he called me an internet activist, my feelings are so hurt, not.

If thats your best defense for supporting slavery, rape, and murder, than you should get a better one. Lol you don't even have an excuse for your actions, just insults for people who hold a mirror up to your face

if we were to “stop supporting” all of the organizations that in some form or another add to discrimination and violence in the world, we would all be making our own clothing, growing our own food, and creating our own entertainment.

I never claimed people should go without basic needs. Basic needs are food, water, clothing, shelter.

There are plenty of ways to entertain one's self that does not directly contribute to murder, rape, and slavery.

Don't like nestle? Drink water at home from a purifier

Don't like the way Tyson treats their chickens? Buy something from a more humane source

Think Balenciaga is sex trafficking children? Buy clothes elsewhere

People go 99 percent of their lives without the world cup, dont act like theres just nooothing else to do or act like you can't escape supporting inhumane things.

Justify it how you want, you are still supporting human rights violations and you are still wrong. You just convince yourself otherwise because FuTbAlL fUn fOr CaVeMaN

you’re missing the whole point lol if people went their whole lives worried about where they bought their shit from they would literally be outcasts in society. if you’re fine with that then great for you but most sane people will do what they can to make the world a better place while still enjoying life’s many great treats “caveman futbal” being one of them.

now i’m done arguing with a reddit bot lol

Theres a difference between being conscious of your purchases and doing the best you can within reason, and watching a televised program that killed people.

Your justification is laughable and wrong. The world cup is only on for a brief time every 4 years, acting like you can't find something else to do briefly is willfully ignorant, but thats what I'd expect from someone so obsessed with watching a sport that they forget people died for you to watch it.

And BTW, large corporations get away with these atrocities, because they know their simple minded fans will watch/buy anyway.

One look at my profile shows in not a bot, so either your so stupid that you will willfully waste time talking to a bot, or your too stupid to check. Either way you are stupid, which has been my entire point.

Thanks for coming to my Ted talk

Since you deleted your original comment I'll ask here.

Would you be the noble internet warrior you seem to think you are if this were posted on r/worldnews?

Why in god's name would you come to this sub just to shit on the WC? For a guy who states "There are plenty of ways to entertain one's self " below, that seems pretty fucking lame my guy.

EDIT: original comment still there. Rest of post stands.

Sounds like the words of someone who doesn't like being told they are entertained at the expense of people's lives.

And this is on world cup, so I knew world cups fans would see it and be pussy hurt if I commented.

Once again, id rather be an internet warrier than support rape and murder, if thats the worst you have, then your on the losing side.

Interesting that you have the option of playing stupid, pretending you don't know that the stadium was built by slaves who died, in a country that treats women like shit, but instead you defend it. And you really think I care about your logic of where and when I choose to comment? My comments don't support rapists and murderers, yours do, but please tell me how im a keyboard warrier.

Not even smart enough to take the time to realize im a woman before calling me "my guy".

Also, I didnt delete my comment, it is clearly there, so try again or something idk

So you didn't actually answer either of my questions, expect me to run down however many posts in your history to see that you are female, ignored my edit re: comment deletion, and put words in my mouth.

K. Good job.

I know full well what brought this WC together and I 100% blame FIFA and the Qatari government. I haven't liked it since these human rights abuses were mere rumors years ago and I don't like it now.

Do you skip pap smears because of the procedure's dubious origins? I mean, you don't HAVE to get them.

Would you not drive over a bridge if there were deaths during its construction? There's probably a long way around.

etc. etc.

Blame the shit doctor for pap smears and the shit engineer for the bridge, not the people who get them and use it.

See how that works? It's not a complicated concept.

People getting into something they've anticipated for years and WHO HAD NO ROLE IN THE HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS shouldn't be villainized by some self-important internet warrior who didn't give a shit about the sport until she found a cause to bitch about.

Get over yourself lady. No one is impressed. Find some joy in life FFS. Jesus.

She doesn’t care, because her logic is flawed in 99% of other situations in life (like you have shown), it would be almost impossible to function if she truly went by what she was saying and it especially doesn’t make sense here. She’s acting based on emotion and not thought out comments so she can act like some morally superior hero because we’re all “bad people” to her. (Despite us having 0 (ZERO) hand in Qatar/Iran/etc. being pieces of shit)

Oh I know she doesn't care lol. She seems to be 26 going on 13.

People like that need to hear it once & awhile, if only to knock them off their self-righteous clouds, even if only briefly.

Should be fun to see if she posts again. I'd be fascinated to hear any more profound insights she might have to offer.

Wow you really are retarded.
also it’s enslaved btw

An intelligent response from an obviously intelligent person /s

Id rather cry about it than support murder, rape, and slavery so I can watch a bunch of dudes play with balls not /s

A quick google will explain everything rather then just bash people that don’t agree with your view. He wasn’t part of the national team and the World Cup. He plays professionally in Iran and made the protests there
Your point changes nothing about the basis of my claim. Just a drop of water in the ocean of human rights violations
Wasn’t trying to change anything. Just giving the facts which you were wrong on
Well you are supporting rape, murder, and slavery by watching the world cup, why would I care about your opinion?

Not an opinion. Literally facts. That you are wrong on. The player wasn’t part of the World Cup. That is a fact. The player protested in Iran. That is a fact. Unless you have a Time Machine and travel to help the player, you cannot change those things because they are fact. None of what I said was an opinion. What you state is an opinion especially with no evidence to support what you are saying. See the difference
So you think its an opinion that people died for you to watch a bunch of men play with balls?

They didn’t die for me. They couldn’t even tell you my name. People die around the world everyday. Why would I be a self centered narcissist thinking they all die for me? Accidents or not, I’m not involved in any deaths

An intelligent response from an obviously intelligent person /s

Id rather cry about it than support murder, rape, and slavery so I can watch a bunch of dudes play with balls not /s
certified Woman ☕️ moment
Ah yes, because apparently you have to be a woman to have empathy
No, but what does the World Cup has to do with what the Iranian government is doing? How can someone be actually so stupid. You’re literally getting downvoted cuz of how stupid you sound.

The world cup invited them to play, the world cup doesn't care about the atrocities.

Weird you can't see the irony in bringing countries together, who are killing people for wanting womens rights, on land build by dead slaves.

I'm being downvoted because this is on world cup.

I could stand in the middle of Iran without a head dress on and be killed, because they dont like women.  The hive mind just doesn't like something, that doesn't mean im wrong. As in, the hive mind of the world cup wants to pretend they arent supporting rape, murder, and slavery.

Alright what if FIFA ban Iran? They need to ban USA too for killing *MILLIONS* of people in Iraq, Afghanistan etc and their military who were *RAPING* the women in those countries.

After that, they need to ban Argentina for the erasure of black people from its history and much more which explains why argentinian team has no black players.

After that, they need to ban Germany for signing a natural resources contract recently with a homophobic, misogynistic country that has done human rights violations (Qatar).

After that, they need to ban Saudi Arabia for killing and attacking Yemenis.

After that, they need to ban Israel for obvious reason.

Do you want me to go on?

You seem to be unaware that I believed the entire thing should be banned.

You can use whatever excuses you want to justify watching it, but you are still wrong for watching it and by watching it you are condoning the behavior.

You don't even pretend to be ignorant, you know exactly what you are supporting, and defend it, because you care more about sports than peoples lives.

If you are lucky, you will never see the other side of your own perspective. People have litterally died for you to watch this sport, there is no justification. You are privileged and do not care about your fellow man.

If FIFA gets banned then the Olympics should be banned too for being held in China.

Super bowl should be banned to for being held in USA

Deaths happen. The numbers have been exaggerated, but I am not trying to say that no one died building the stadiums. Why’re we talking about Qatar, if the Iranian government is shit? Cuz you hate Arabs or The Middle East don’t you? You believe they shouldn’t be able to have a happy moment for once. I wouldn’t be surprised if you came for Qatars neck on a post that criticizes Saudi Arabia or UAE.

People died building the Eiffel Tower, the pyramids in Giza, and many more. Get over it.

You not watching this worldcup would mean they died for nothing.
